title: The Blues Cafe Be Green by Il Margutta
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Il Margutta, the first gourmet vegetarian experience for the island having been opened in 1979, has been renovated and includes bio fish dishes, but with plenty of vegan choices. Above open hours apply from June-Sept.
streetAddress: Liscia di Vacca Loc Lu Pisantinu
